DOC.brief_summary: Excessive body weight obesity reach epidemic proportion last decade , may cause many chronic disease . Maintaining healthy life style could decrease risk obesity , metabolic syndrome cardiovascular disease . The study aim evaluate long-term low glycemic index ( GI ) diet intervention lipid profile , body composition mechanism obese woman . The pilot study recruit twenty healthy subject , serve test food determine low GI food . In experiment period , twenty woman age 20-50 year recruit . To include study , subject BMI 24 kg/m2 , either one ( fat mass ≧ 30 % waistline > 80 cm ) . Before dietary intervention , participant receive food choice table dietary questionnaire record dietary intake . The study randomize , crossover , control clinical trail . The experiment period six week , participant provide low GI diet ( lunch dinner ) . On 0 , 3 , 6 week , subject measurement body composition ( body weight , body mass , waist hip circumference ) collect fast blood sample analysis lipid profile , free fatty acid , blood sugar , insulin , adiponectin , leptin fatty acid synthesis enzyme . Statistical analysis perform paired t-test . The study expect long-term low GI diet intervention beneficial effect regulate body composition obese woman .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Low Glycemic Index Diet Body Composition Mechanism Obese Women
DOC.criteria: BMI 24 kg/m2 , either one ( fat mass ≧ 30 % waistline > 80 cm ) Cardiovascular disease type 2 diabetes mellitus impair glucose tolerance serious liver renal disease , gastrointestinal disease proceed serious diet control formerly three month take supplemental food product medication know influence lipid carbohydrate metabolism
